name: Weretiger
senses: darkvision 60 ft. (tiger or hybrid form only), passive Perception 15

actions.name: Multiattack (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.desc: The weretiger makes two attacks  neither of which can be a bite.

actions.name: Longsword (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage.

actions.name: Longbow (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw (Tiger or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage. If the weretiger moves at least 20 feet straight towards the target before the attack  the target makes a DC 13 Strength saving throw  falling prone on a failure.

actions.name: Bite (Tiger or Hybrid Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage. If the target is a humanoid  it makes a DC 13 Constitution saving throw. On a failure  it is cursed with weretiger lycanthropy.

bonus_actions.name: Shapeshift
bonus_actions.desc: The weretiger changes its form to a Large tiger, a tiger-humanoid hybrid, or into its true form, which is a humanoid. While shapeshifted, its statistics are unchanged except for its size. It can't speak in tiger form. Its equipment is not transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

bonus_actions.name: Opportune Bite (Tiger or Hybrid Form Only)
bonus_actions.desc: The weretiger makes a bite attack against a prone creature.

bonus_actions.name: Frenzied Bite (While Bloodied
bonus_actions.desc: The weretiger makes a bite attack.

special_abilities.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
special_abilities.desc: The weretiger has advantage on Perception checks that rely on hearing or smell.

special_abilities.name: Wolfsbane
special_abilities.desc: Lycanthropes are repelled by the wolfsbane flower. A lycanthrope in hybrid or beast form is poisoned while within 10 feet of a living or dried wolfsbane flower that it can smell. If wolfsbane is applied to a weapon or ammunition, lycanthropes are damaged by the weapon as if it were silver. An application of wolfsbane lasts for 1 hour.
